config_environment.label: Target Server
config_environment.comment:
Use Staging for testing payment,
Use Production for real payment,
Use Development for less stable testing payment.

config_chainnumber.label: Chain Number
config_chainnumber.comment: Chain Number generated by DOKU, used if 1 MID from Banks want to be accessed by multiple website. Default is NA

config_timelimit_paynow.label: Timelimit for Direct Payment
config_timelimit_paynow.comment:
This is timelimit for every Direct Payment Channel, such as: Credit Card and ECommerce Banking.
When timelimit reached and no payment received, Magento will send Check Status to DOKU to ensure final payment status.
To use this feature please activate Cronjob on Magento. Magento Wiki: How to setup Cronjob.

config_timelimit_paylater.label: Timelimit for Indirect Payment
config_timelimit_paylater.comment:
This is timelimit for every Indirect Payment Channel, such as: Virtual Account and Instore Payment.
When timelimit reached and no payment received, Magento will send Check Status to DOKU to ensure final payment status.
To use this feature please activate Cronjob on Magento. Magento Wiki: How to setup Cronjob.

notifyurl.label: Notify URL
notifyurl.comment: Service that will receive payment notification from DOKU

redirectbackurl.label: Redirect Back URL
redirectbackurl.comment: Service that will receive redirection back from DOKU and shows payment result page

identifyurl.label: Identify URL (Not Mandatory)
identifyurl.comment: Service that will receive chosen payment channel information from DOKU before payment

reviewurl.label: Review URL (Not Yet Implemented)
reviewurl.comment: Service that will receive review notification from DOKU after EDU Verification

inquiryurl.label: Inquiry URL (Not Yet Implemented)
inquiryurl.comment: Service that will receive inquiry from DOKU for Direct Inquiry Pay Later

template.label: Email Settings
template.comment:
We are using Magento Transactional Emails to send email notification to Customer, whether payment is success or declined.
Please make sure "Mail Sending Settings" is not disabled on System -> Configuration -> System -> Mail Sending Settings -> Disable Email Communications (NO).
If you want to change the Email template please do it on System -> Transactional Emails.

tenor.label: Tenor
tenor.comment: State every available tenor, use comma to separate

promoid.label: Promo ID
promoid.comment: Given by DOKU for each tenor, use comma to separate in the same sequence

tenor.label: Tenor
tenor.comment: State every available tenor, use comma to separate

promoid.label: Promo ID
promoid.comment: Given by DOKU for each tenor, use comma to separate in the same sequence

channel_sinarmas_va.label: Sinarmas Bank VA via DOKU Aggregator

channel_mandiri_billpayment.label: Mandiri Bill Payment via DOKU Aggregator
